tool.name: qiime2 diversity alpha-rarefaction

param.name: table
param.label: table: FeatureTable[Frequency]
param.help: [required] Feature table to compute rarefaction curves from.

param.name: max_depth
param.label: max_depth: Int % Range(1, None)
param.help: [required] The maximum rarefaction depth. Must be greater than min_depth.

repeat.name: metrics
repeat.help: [optional] The metrics to be measured. By default computes observed_features, shannon, and if phylogeny is provided, faith_pd.

param.name: steps
param.label: steps: Int % Range(2, None)
param.help: [default: 10] The number of rarefaction depths to include between min_depth and max_depth.

param.name: iterations
param.label: iterations: Int % Range(1, None)
param.help: [default: 10] The number of rarefied feature tables to compute at each step.

tool.help:
QIIME 2: diversity alpha-rarefaction ==================================== Alpha rarefaction curves
Outputs: -------- :visualization.qzv: <no description>
|
Description: ------------ Generate interactive alpha rarefaction curves by computing rarefactions between `min_depth` and `max_depth`. The number of intermediate depths to compute is controlled by the `steps` parameter, with n `iterations` being computed at each rarefaction depth. If sample metadata is provided, samples may be grouped based on distinct values within a metadata column.
|
